tags.name: Large Breasts
tags.description: Features a character with larger-than-average breasts.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: College
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a college or university.

tags.name: Fitness
tags.description: Centers around exercise with the aim of improving physical health.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

node.description: **Miura Kazuya** is a Japanese director, episode director, animator, animation supervisor, animation director and storyboard artist.

__Height:__ 153 cm

[Profile (Aoni Pro)](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/ohzora-naomi.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/osorasan703) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/osorasan703/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naomi_Ōzora) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/大空直美)

Naomi Oozora is a Japanese voice actress from Osaka Prefecture.

In June 2012, she made her voice actor debut as a child in [Saint Seiya Omega](https://anilist.co/anime/12929). In January 2014, Oozora first starring role as [Inari Fushimi](https://anilist.co/character/74317) in [Inari, Konkon, Koi Iroha](https://anilist.co/anime/20488).

On May 25, 2023, she announced on Twitter that she had married that February to a man she met and dated from last year, and that she is pregnant.

(Source: Wikipedia)

__[Website](https://kano-official.amebaownd.com/) | [Old Website (Warner Bros)](https://whv-amusic.com/kano/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kano_2525) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCShXNLMXCfstmWKH_q86B8w) | [Nico Nico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/15078610)__


__Introduction:__
Kano is a Japanese vocalist under record label Imperial Records (2018–), having previously been under Warner Bros. Home Entertainment (2015–2018).

__Biography:__
She made her initial debut in 2010, where she would post covers of songs to the video sharing site Nico Nico Douga. A couple of years later in 2012, Kano would make her first original VOCALOID song titled "[Toumei Ningen no Nihilism](https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm16824160)".

It wasn't until 2015, a whole 3 years later, that Kano would release what would be known as her major debut, and which would also become her most popular song to date. Her major debut was the song "[Stella-rium](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GNkPJvVEm0s)", which would release through the record label Warner Bros. Home Entertainment as her first single. The song first aired as an opening theme to the TV anime _[Houkago no Pleiades](https://anilist.co/anime/17919/Houkago-no-Pleiades/)_, featuring a shorter TV Size version. The full version of the song released later on May 20, 2015.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [director](https://anilist.co/staff/235529)._

Affiliated with music production group [Heart's Cry](https://anilist.co/staff/252231/). Previously affiliated with PlatinumGames.

Composer, Arranger, Instrumentalist and Lyricist for:
· Astral Chain, NieR:Automata, Xenoblade Chronicles 2, Bayonetta 2, IDOLM@STER: CINDERELLA GIRLS, CHUNITHM, Deemo 2.0, ARCAEA.
· Kamen Rider, Himouto! Umaru-chan, Ghost in the Shell.
· He started his musical career by making EDM and symphonic metal VOCALOID doujin albums, such as Eschatology, featuring Megurine Luka.

__Graduated:__ Todaiji Gakuen Junior and Senior High School, Tokyo University of Foreign Studies

__[Website](http://rebrast.com/creators/uz/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Boundnotes)__

__Tatsuya Yano__ is a Japanese guitarist, violinist, composer, arranger, lyricist and trackmaker.
__Tomokazu Tashiro__ is a Japanese composer, arranger and member of the music production team [Q-MHz](https://anilist.co/staff/156926/QMHz).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/HdkzTanaka)

__Birthplace:__ Osaka Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Kobe University (Faculty of Developmental Sciences, Department of Human Representation)

__Hidekazu Tanaka__ is a Japanese composer and arranger.

He left MONACA on July 31, 2021, and went independent. 

On October 24, 2022, he was arrested on suspicion of sexual assault of a teenage girl in Meguro, Tokyo in August of that year. On March 15, 2023, Tanaka admitted to obscenity charges which included saying obscene language to a 15-year-old girl, along with admitting to voyeurism at least dozens of times in the past 10 years.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/HdkzTanaka)

__Birthplace:__ Osaka Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Kobe University (Faculty of Developmental Sciences, Department of Human Representation)

__Hidekazu Tanaka__ is a Japanese composer and arranger.

He left MONACA on July 31, 2021, and went independent. 

On October 24, 2022, he was arrested on suspicion of sexual assault of a teenage girl in Meguro, Tokyo in August of that year. On March 15, 2023, Tanaka admitted to obscenity charges which included saying obscene language to a 15-year-old girl, along with admitting to voyeurism at least dozens of times in the past 10 years.
